mapper.select: SELECT h.id as id, h.hashtag as hashtag FROM tbl_hashtag h, tbl_hashtag_in_diary th WHERE th.diary_id = #{diary_id} and th.hashtag_id = h.id
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tbl_hashtag_in_diary (diary_id, hashtag_id) VALUE (#{diary_id}, (SELECT id FROM tbl_hashtag WHERE hashtag=#{hashtag}))
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM tbl_hashtag_in_diary WHERE diary_id = #{diary_id} and hashtag_id = (select id from tbl_hashtag where hashtag = #{hashtag})
